channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023090726
item.description:
Report X-2023090726

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER WAS UNLOADING THE SHUTTLE, WHEN HE NOTICED THE LEAKING PACKAGE, HE NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR, WHO THEN NOTIFIED RESPONDER. RESPONDER WENT AND SECURED THE PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP AND THE PROCESSED THRU THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023090295
item.description:
Report X-2023090295

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: TRENTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box torn while in transit causing one of two Carlovers Bolt 2.5Gal jugs cap to become loose. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box torn while in transit causing one of two Carlovers Bolt 2.5Gal jugs cap to become loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2023090286
item.description:
Report X-2023090286

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM THE SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO THE EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET DURING THE DAY SORT. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS RAPICIDE PA PART, A 2 BOTTLES AND PART B 2 BOTTLES 4X5 LITERS Hydrogen peroxide and peroxyacetic acid mixtures, stabilized WITH ONE PLASTIC BOTTLE OF PART B WITH A LOOSE CAP AND CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 10% SPILLAGE. DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023082035
item.description:
Report X-2023082035

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-28
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACAKGE UNLOADED FROM TRUCK AND IT WAS NOTICED IT WAS WET. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SECURED, REPACKED AND AWAITING FOR DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: 1 CONTAINER LEAKED FROM A LOOSE CAP. APPROXIMATELY 1 CUP LEAKED OUT. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED, REPACKED AND WAITING FOR DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Contents shifted in shipping box while in transit causing one EcoLab Aquanomic 2.0 container to have loose cap. Package was immediately placed in a RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Contents shifted in shipping box while in transit causing one EcoLab Aquanomic 2.0 container to have loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in a RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2023082021
item.description:
Report X-2023082021

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort in a plastic drum. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "MEDIVATORS RAPICIDE PA" to be wet and torn open, from a loose cap, most likely caused from being mishandled or dropped during the unloading process. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a plastic salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2023090132
item.description:
Report X-2023090132

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: LAWNSIDE
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023090132: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL OF A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL CONTAINER WITH HAZMAT CHEMICAL WAS DISCOVERED TO BE LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED LEAKAGE FROM CAP. X-2023090133: DESIGNATED RESPONSER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER DISCOVERED A CONTAINER WITH A LEAKING CAP/CLOSURE.

item.title: Report X-2023081933
item.description:
Report X-2023081933

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during day sort in plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed jerrycan of "ZEP CONCENTRATED INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER" to have small puncture near bottom, most likely caused from being dropped. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be disposed of in salvage drum, as there is no way to ship jerrycan without leaking.

item.title: Report X-2023081919
item.description:
Report X-2023081919

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: WAYNE
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE UNLOADED FROM TRAILER AT DESTINATION STATION. PACKAGE HANDLER TRAINER IN UNDLOAD NOTICED WET PART OF PACKAGE AND CALLED QA OVER. PLACED IN QA HAZMAT CAGE TO PREVENT FURTHER DAMAGE. DescribePack: ONE BOTTOM CORNER OF OUTER PACKAGE CRUSHED. 2 BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS AND LEAKED. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CLOSURES RE-CLOSED. PLACED IN VENTILATED HAZMAT CAGE AT BACK OF BUILDING.
